subject: RE: [junit] JUnit extension
msgSnippet: That doesn t satisfy Richard s goal of no recompilation.  I like his idea. I think I ll try it out on my own test runner. Kevin ... From: Johannes Link
messageBody:
That doesn't satisfy Richard's goal of no recompilation.  I like his idea.  I think I'll try it out on my own test runner.
 
Kevin
 
-----Original Message-----
From: Johannes Link [mailto:john.link@...]
Sent: Friday, January 19, 2001 3:45 AM
To: junit@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [junit] JUnit extension


> 3. Run a specific test in a single test-case.
> Solution: Currently I have to modify a suite() method.
Try:
junit.textui.TestRunner.run(new MyTestCase("testMethod"));

Johannes
